Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Delicious beyond expectations! All of the food is delightfully tasty and the dishes are nothing short of gigantic. The staff is also super friendly and helpful, making the experience complete. Fully recommended for a nice dinner or a meeting with a group of friends!

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text:
Very friendly staff with an authentic looking decor.
I had the raspberry margarita which tasted mostly like Sourpuss. We also had the tacos al pastor and barbacoa (17 euro each) - very pricy and not very flavorful â€¦

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: The BEST Mexican food experience Iâ€™ve ever had! Thank you Perla and Nic and the whole staff!

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: A nicely decorated restaurant serving dishes with a surprising taste. It's good. Worthwhile to try out.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: I had tried all the so-called top Mexican spots in Amsterdam and gone home missing tacos until I found Mexican Boulevard. Authentically fantastic Mexican food. Amazingly friendly service. Worth a 20-minute bike ride in the rain. This place â€¦

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Best Mexican we've had in Amsterdam. Great flavours. Try the sopes, pibil, grasshopper tacos... In fact anything! It's all good

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Good food, it definitely has a more authentic feeling than the other I've tried in town before, they have a nice terrace I would like to come back with better weather to try it out. Also nice selection of Mexican beers although only one on â€¦

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Good good food a bit expensive but I can overlook it since I almost had to undo my button that I was so full. Nice decorations but I guess we did not catch them on their best day, which was a bit disappointing since we've read their service â€¦

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text:
A pretty good place for tacos.

Myself and a few friends decided to stop here on a whim, and we had a pretty â€¦

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Disappointing!!! I was expecting real mexican, but what we got was something else! If you order tacos, you get a portion of 5 tacos, all the same, the menu explicitly tells you cannot mix flavors, it gets very boring! Mexican food should be â€¦

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: The food is good, tried few dishes and they're close to real Mexican food, little less tasty version but for Europe it's quite good. What takes 2 stars away is: one, I know the food, I'm native Mexican and there's no way a tlayuda costs 18 euros! That's 3 days pay in Mexican lower income families! And 2, it gets quite noisy.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Decent tacos (a little heavy on the meat). Amazing chimichanga. Horrible guacamole. Good chips. A decent experience if you're in the neighborhood, but still on the search for amazing Mexican food in Amsterdam.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: We ate here last year and were really looking forward to it but were very disappointed. The portions were tiny and the carnitas tasted like shoarma. It came recommended by a Mexican colleague but was a far cry from the delicious California Mexican food I grew up eating.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Okay food, but way too expensive. I ordered a main course of about 18.50 and i wasn't full at all. That's wrong. My friend wasnt full either. What do you want me to do: get another main course? Or get a snack at home to fill me up? The food â€¦

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: This place is wonderful. I felt as if they had the best tacos I have ever tasted!!! Which is weird because I wouldn't think I would find such great mexican food in Amsterdam considering I live closer to Mexico.Get the Sheperd

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Not the best Mexican restaurant. Some dishes can be acceptable like the mole. Some others are truly bad. In general all the food is very blend. Something is missing. A new chef maybe?

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text:
Bad experience ,
We are living in the area and we wanted to try this restaurant ,
So we have been there in Tuesday this week , â€¦

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Authentic Mexican food that we have been missing here in Amsterdam. Margaritas are fabulous, our waiter was oober charming and the chef's have done a fabulous job creating the menu! Delish!

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Decided to try this place last night, the food was delicious and the portions were very generous. Excellent service from their mexicaans staff. Also very very good margaritas en mojitos. Overall great experience.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Food was good but not incredible, the service was ok but also not amazing. Our server wasn't the friendliest, not rude or anything but the service was a let down. In conclusion we were expecting a more exciting experience with both the food and service. Still the prices are fair and the menu has many options.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: After living in Mexico for some time it was quite refreshing to discover fresh and genuine Mexican taste in Amsterdam. Great hosts, beautiful design, what else can you wish for a Mexican night out. Muchas Gracias!

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: One of the best mexican restaurants in Amsterdam. Excellent decoration! Excellent margaritas. Try the pastor tacos but, watch out the spicy sauces!

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Great Mexican food and drinks in a cozy neighborhood location. Plenty of vegetarian options, excellent corn tortillas, and decor that's fun without being a Mexico stereotype.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Simply amazing. Big fan of Mexican food, this ties a place I found in southern Spain for the best Mexican food I've tried on this side of the Atlantic.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Great atmosphere and full of decorative life. Food was really REAL! Very good meat. Staff are friendly and welcoming. Would reccommend this place.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Authentic Mexican food! The hospitality of the staff is great and the food is delicious! Also a nice sunny terrace in summer!

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Good choice of tequila and food (in general). I went also for Independence Day and they had a fixed menu that was horrible. I would return only when the actual menu is available

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: cozy and great restaurant with friendly staff and delicious food.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Very nice authentic Mexican restaurant. Nice atmosphere, nice staff, good food, good Margarita's.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: The staff was friendly, but the food wasn't anything special. The price is a bit above the average of what you expect, and it seems they try to make up for it in quantity.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Amazing authentic Mexican food! Tacos al pastor highly recommended!

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Authentic Mexican food, kind people,great service:)

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Take away - expensive for what you get  - forgot some items, painful conclusion. Decent initiative in the neighborhood! Needs improvement

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Great spot hidden away on Van Wou start and worth the trip. The sopes and cochinita de pibil were excellent.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Decent food and a good ambiance but the dining experience is let down by the chaotic service and cold food.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Great authentic Mexican food with excellent service

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Delicious Mexican food in a great atmosphere.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Excelent place! Real taste of Mexico, approved by a Mexican ;)

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Slow cooked Mexican stews and sides bursting with flavour. Worth a detour.

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Solid Mexican food. Great service

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Great food and cocktails. Loved it :)

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: One of my favorite Mexican restaurants in Amsterdam

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Without doubt best mexican food in Amsterdam!

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Nacho's could be better. The rest is good!

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: Eat eat and eat... oh and drink margaritas .. Friendly service :)

Review Text: ABUSE OF THE TERM "SLOWFOOD", THE FOOD, MENU, INGREDIENTS HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH TRUE SLOWFOOD

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Owners are a Mexican / Dutch couple. Very friendly and do everything to make the guests feel at home. The food is really authentic Mexican and delicious! â€¦

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Atmospheric restaurant, Mexican elements but not too kitsch or cheesy. Very tasty (really Mexican) eaten. One point for improvement: the menu is very unclear. â€¦

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious mexican food, authentic and good Mezcal. Jan is very welcoming and friendly. To be repeated! â€¦

Name: Mexico Boulevard
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious food and drinks. Not TexMex, but authentic dishes. The passion of the 2 owners is reflected in everything. â€¦

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Real Mexican. I didn't find the nachos special that special. The menu, the service and the dishes are completely OK â€¦

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Authentic Mexican food. We had been looking for something like this for some time. Very friendly and very good food â€¦

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious food: very authentic. You notice that slow food is really being done (had to wait a bit longer) a gain for the neighborhood! â€¦
